Step right up: expresión utilizada para invitar a alguien a acercarse o a participar en algo.
Tickets: boletos o entradas para un evento.
Freak show: espectáculo de rarezas o fenómenos humanos.
takes: to take something means to grab or seize it.
Mirkwood: a fictional forest in J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth universe.
abused: mistreated or harmed physically, emotionally, or mentally.
kidnapped: taken by force and held captive.
come by: to visit or stop by a place.
